Battle Favor.name: Battle Favor
Battle Favor.fullText:
Tactical Warpriest Utility 12Battle Favor

When you score a critical hit against an enemy, your deity favors you with healing or by renewing one of your prayers.

Daily        Divine, Healing
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You roll a natural 20 when making a melee attack.

Effect: You regain hit points as if you had spent two healing surges, or you regain the use of one cleric daily attack power that you have already used today. Once you use this power, you cannot recover it except by taking an extended rest.


Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 74, Class Compendium.
Battle Favor.flavor: When you score a critical hit against an enemy, your deity favors you with healing or by renewing one of your prayers.
Battle Favor.trigger: You roll a natural 20 when making a melee attack.
Battle Favor.effect: You regain hit points as if you had spent two healing surges, or you regain the use of one cleric daily attack power that you have already used today. Once you use this power, you cannot recover it except by taking an extended rest.

Battle Pyres.name: Battle Pyres
Battle Pyres.fullText:
Tactical Warpriest Attack 20Battle Pyres

You channel a powerful prayer through your weapon, turning your enemies into pyres ablaze with radiant energy.

Daily        Divine, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Primary Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength or Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: 10 + Strength modifier or Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and ongoing 5 radiant damage (save ends). Make the secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One creature taking ongoing radiant damage within 5 squares of you

  Attack: Strength or Wisdom vs. Reflex

  Hit: 5[W] + Strength modifier or Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Effect: Until the ongoing damage ends on every primary target, you can take a standard action on your subsequent turns to repeat the secondary attack.


Update (4/26/2011)
Updated to match Class Compendium.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 74, Class Compendium.
Battle Pyres.flavor: You channel a powerful prayer through your weapon, turning your enemies into pyres ablaze with radiant energy.
Battle Pyres.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier or Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Battle Pyres.secondaryTarget: One creature taking ongoing radiant damage within 5 squares of you
Battle Pyres.effect: Until the ongoing damage ends on every primary target, you can take a standard action on your subsequent turns to repeat the secondary attack.

Battle Cry.name: Battle Cry
Battle Cry.fullText:
Tactical Warpriest Attack 11Battle Cry

You attack every enemy next to you, shouting a revitalizing battle cry that inspires your allies.

Encounter        Divine, Healing, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 1

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength or Wisdom vs. Fortitude

Hit: Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier or Wisdom modifier damage.

Effect: You (if you are bloodied) and each bloodied ally within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge.


Update (4/26/2011)
Updated to match Class Compendium.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 74, Class Compendium.
Battle Cry.flavor: You attack every enemy next to you, shouting a revitalizing battle cry that inspires your allies.
Battle Cry.onHit: Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier or Wisdom modifier damage.
Battle Cry.effect: You (if you are bloodied) and each bloodied ally within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge.
